turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I’d like to order a pizza, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Let’s start with your address and phone number

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: My address is 123 Evergreen Terrace, Springfield. My phone number is 555- 789

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, thank you. What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I have a super pepperoni pizza, large, thin crust with extra mozzarella cheese?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any sides with that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, can I please have 2 garlic breads and a bottle of lemonade?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Delivery time will be approximately 30 minutes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Please have the correct change for the driver.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks, how much do I owe you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Here you go, I have $20, you can keep the change

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sir, that will be $11 and 20 cents for your medium pepperoni pizza with extra topping of olives and pickles, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: enjoy the rest of your shift haha

items.name: extra topping of olives and pickles
